question: plan one day tour near rumtek monastry
answer: 🌄 1-Day Trip from Rumtek Monastery: Morning: Explore Rumtek Monastery → Golden Stupa → Botanical Garden; Midday: Visit Banjhakri Falls; Afternoon: Lunch in Gangtok (local Sikkimese food); Evening: Stroll & shop at MG Marg, optional Tibetology Institute.

question: suggest sikkim food
answer: 🍴 Must-try Sikkim foods: Momos, Thukpa, Phagshapa, Gundruk Soup, Kinema Curry, Sha Phaley, Sel Roti. Pair with local tongba (millet beer).

question: local festival of sikkim
answer: 🎉 Major local festivals of Sikkim: Losar (Feb/March), Saga Dawa (May/June), Pang Lhabsol (Aug/Sept), Losoong/Namsoong (Dec), Maghe Sankranti (Jan).

question: best time to visit for festivals
answer: ✨ Best times to visit Sikkim for festivals: Feb–March (Losar), May–June (Saga Dawa), Aug–Sept (Pang Lhabsol), Dec (Losoong/Namsoong). Best seasons: March–June & Sept–Dec.
